name: HELL'S WORK
description:
Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #9

Theme: CLIMBING!

Controls:

  • A/D to move.
  • Spacebar to jump.

You work on the bottom of hell and it's time to leave. But the elevator is broken and you need to climb your way out.

The Score is based on the amount of jumps and time it take you to complete the game. The less time and jumps you do, the higher the score.

If you want you can comment your HighScore and any feedback!

Thanks for playing!!!
